document_data.name: Klaruuotur
document_data.mainbody: '''Klaruutor''' was an [[Dragon aging|ancient]] [[crystal dragon]] who served as the guardian of the family of [[Calim]], the [[noble djinni]] lord who founded the [[Calim Empire]].{{Cite web enhancement/Roll Call of Dragons}}
document_data.Activities: Klaruutor resided within a palatial extradimensional space, similar to ''[[Mordenkainen's magnificent mansion]]'', lying within the [[Forest of Mir]] in [[Calimshan]] and invisible from the outside. Within, he and several [[djinn]] vassals loyal to Calim guarded and tended to Calim's queen and twin sons, as well as its many artworks, treasure, and [[magic item]]s. The family had been placed in ''[[temporal stasis]]'' and hidden here by Calim's generals after the fall of the Calim Empire in {{Yearlink|-6100}}, to protect them from the violent purges of [[genie]]s that took place in the successor state of [[Coramshan]]. They awaited the day when Calim was released from imprisonment in the [[Calimemnon Crystal]].
document_data.History: Klaruutor was still alive after the [[Dracorage]] of [[1373 DR]].
